conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric conversion with clear wall geometry and cutaway perspective.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls rendered with perfect height and thickness; clear isometric-like projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout fidelity is extremely high. All rooms (Bedroom, Toilet, Kitchen, Living, Balcony, Utility) are present and correctly placed. Proportions match 2D plan closely.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture, bathroom fixtures, and kitchen appliances are correctly placed and scaled according to the floorplan.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering, no artifacts, consistent lighting and materials.

detected_errors.description: Minor door/opening detail simplified compared to architectural swings in 2D.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and clean 3D isometric conversion that retains the exact room configuration and furniture layout of the 2D architectural plan.
